name: Salesforce to Txt
description: Streaming pipeline. Ingests objects from Salesforce to a .txt file

parameters.name: loginUrl
parameters.label: Salesforce endpoint to authenticate to
parameters.helpText: URL to Salesforce login via OAUTH in format 'https://MyDomainName.my.salesforce.com/services/oauth2/token'

parameters.name: sObjectName
parameters.label: Salesforce object to pull supported by CDAP Salesforce Streaming Source

parameters.name: pushTopicName
parameters.label: Name of the push topic that was created from query for some sObject
parameters.helpText: This push topic should have enabled 'pushTopicNotifyCreate' property. If push topic with such name doesn't exist, then new push topic for provided 'sObjectName' will be created automatically.

parameters.name: pullFrequencySec
parameters.label: Delay in seconds between polling for new records updates

parameters.name: startOffset
parameters.label: Inclusive start offset from which the reading should be started

parameters.name: secretStoreUrl
parameters.label: URL to credentials in Vault
parameters.helpText: URL to Salesforce credentials in HashiCorp Vault secret storage in format 'http(s)://vaultip:vaultport/path/to/credentials'

parameters.name: vaultToken
parameters.label: Vault token
parameters.helpText: Token to access HashiCorp Vault secret storage
